TimeArrays.jl temporary repo to explore combining Arrays of SeriesPair into multicolumn type with similar behavior API in progress (check back often) julia> using TimeArrays, MarketData julia> ohlc 505x6 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1981-12-31 Open High Low Close Volume Adj Cl 1980-01-03 | 105.76 106.08 103.26 105.22 50480000.00 105.22 1980-01-04 | 105.22 107.08 105.09 106.52 39130000.00 106.52 1980-01-07 | 106.52 107.80 105.80 106.81 44500000.00 106.81 1980-01-08 | 106.81 109.29 106.29 108.95 53390000.00 108.95 ... 1981-12-24 | 122.31 123.06 121.57 122.54 23940000.00 122.54 1981-12-28 | 122.54 123.36 121.73 122.27 28320000.00 122.27 1981-12-29 | 122.27 122.90 121.12 121.67 35300000.00 121.67 1981-12-30 | 121.67 123.11 121.04 122.30 42960000.00 122.30 1981-12-31 | 122.30 123.42 121.57 122.55 40780000.00 122.55 julia> ohlc[1] 1x6 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1980-01-03 Open High Low Close Volume Adj Cl 1980-01-03 | 105.76 106.08 103.26 105.22 50480000.00 105.22 julia> ohlc[1:2] 2x6 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1980-01-04 Open High Low Close Volume Adj Cl 1980-01-03 | 105.76 106.08 103.26 105.22 50480000.00 105.22 1980-01-04 | 105.22 107.08 105.09 106.52 39130000.00 106.52 julia> ohlc[[firstday, tenthday]] 2x6 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1980-01-16 Open High Low Close Volume Adj Cl 1980-01-03 | 105.76 106.08 103.26 105.22 50480000.00 105.22 1980-01-16 | 111.14 112.90 110.38 111.05 67700000.00 111.05 julia> ohlc["Low"][1:2] 2x1 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1980-01-04 Low 1980-01-03 | 103.26 1980-01-04 | 105.09 julia> ohlc["Open", "Close"][1:2] 2x2 TimeArray{Float64,2} 1980-01-03 to 1980-01-04 Open Close 1980-01-03 | 105.76 105.22 1980-01-04 | 105.22 106.52 julia> op[1:3] .- cl[2:4] 2x1 TimeArray{Float64,1} 1980-01-04 to 1980-01-07 Op.-Cl 1980-01-04 | -1.30 1980-01-07 | -0.29
